definition: old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted for further assessment.
sentences.chinese: 本局只會聯絡初步入選的申請人作進一步評覈。

sentences.english: Candidates may be required to produce medical proof of their disability.
sentences.chinese: 申請人或須提交醫生證明書，以證明他爲殘疾人士。

sentences.english: The applicant shall pay the prescribed fees for exemption from inspection.
sentences.chinese: 申請人應按照規定交納免驗費用。

sentences.english: He is the applicant for Party membership.
Each Applicant must be aged 18 years and above.
sentences.chinese: 每一申請人須滿十八週歲及以上。

sentences.english: The applicant is required to submit the Guarantee Fund and Cash Position.
sentences.chinese: 申請人應當向本公司交納結算保證金以及結算備付金。

sentences.english: Applicants presenting International Baccalaureate diplomas are eligible for general admission to the University.
sentences.chinese: 申請人提交國際文憑文憑一般大學入學資格。

sentences.english: Last year there were 17,000 applicants in the city for 3,000 such posts.
sentences.chinese: 去年，該市有一萬七千名申請人申請三千個這類職位。

sentences.english: The dean turned away two applicants this morning.
sentences.chinese: 上午，系主任打發走了兩個申請人。

sentences.english: The Claimant's claim along with underlying facts and evidence.
sentences.chinese: 申請人的請求及所依據的事實和證據。

sentences.english: The visa application charge will be returned to the applicant, care of the migration agent's address.
sentences.chinese: 簽證申請費將會經由移民代理的地址轉交退給申請人。

sentences.english: This form is to be completed in English and Chinese by non-travelling parents of minors under 18 years of age.
sentences.chinese: 此表格由十八歲以下申請人的不隨行父母填寫。

sentences.english: A computer-generated random lottery drawing chooses selectees for diversity visas.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃由電腦隨機性抽籤選取申請人。

sentences.english: The applicant should file the application at the place of residence.
sentences.chinese: 申請人應當在居留地提出申請。

sentences.english: Consular officers can request that this form be filled out by other applicants as well.
sentences.chinese: 領事官可要求其他申請人也填寫此表格。

sentences.english: Successful applicants would be informed seven day before the commencement date of the respective event.
sentences.chinese: 本局將於該項目舉行前七天通知成功報名之申請人。

definition: to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
